metadata.title: CVE-2019-7334 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3,allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code via a vulnerable'Exportfile' parameter value in the view export (export.php) because properfiltration is omitted.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
